item.description:
Lets get out and enjoy Friday night to this great dancing band, we can meet before the band starts  and get some tables, I will try to get us reservations. If you want to eat they have a great Italian menu, plenty of parking  in strip mall. Band starts at 9pm,Try to get there earlier to meet everyone. Nice cozy lounge.

WildFire has been entertaining audiences around New England for over a decade.

Sought after for their powerful dynamic vocals, versatile musical selections and high-energy interactive performances, the band can be found performing at clubs throughout the North Shore Massachusetts and New England area.   Band: Wildfire Time: 9-1:00am
item.how_to_find_us: you can always call me if running late 978-857-6626

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Dance to Live Band "WILDFIRE"
